name: Scenes From an Italian Cafe (Phil Johnson)
name_original: Scenes From an Italian Cafe (Phil Johnson)
description:
This game was originally posted here on December 1st 2019 for the University of California Irvine's Video Game Development Club, however all future updates/bug fixes will occur on this page.

As the world's newest Barista, Max, you will make coffee, meet new customers, and maybe even help a friend find love in this interactive Visual Novel, featuring gameplay inspired by VA-11 HALL-A. Who knows what will happen? Might even see an old friend. 

Playable on windows, mac, and linux, so now everyone can kick back, brew up a warm drink, and work a minimum wage job, just like you always wanted!

Programming - Benjamin Chiaro, Jamison McLaughlin

Audio- Jack Bueermann

Writing- Jamison McLaughlin, Michelle Fredericks, Anna Salieva, Mariah Rosario

Art- Mariah Rosario

and Amecie Lubin as Amnesty
